document_data.mainbody:
indle Street was a slightly arched street that began on the edge of The Steeps, ran across Heapside, and ended in the Eastway district of Baldurs Gate.
Bindle Street began at the citys Old Wall, where the famous store, Felogyrs Fireworks, stood. From there, the street ran north, slightly curving away from the harbor, and then back towards the water. Along the way, it passed the Blushing Mermaid, ran parallel to The Eastern Wet, and ended just a block east of Athcaulyrs Stand docks. Most of Loklee Street ran parallel, to the east of Bindle Street.
